VI.i.2.B.1.a
.
Definition:  Erroneous Payments
Erroneous payments
are payments the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) made to a beneficiary that are not authorized by law.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
